author: fern
description:
Check out https://anydesk.com/fern to try it out for free (ad)

Seek help if you are struggling with substance use:
Narcotics Anonymous: https://na.org/
SMART Recovery Global: https://smartrecoveryglobal.org/
FindTreatment: https://findtreatment.gov/

Crystal meth is one of the most destructive drugs in the world. It has been flooding Germany for years. How did this happen?

Sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1OIjFK2o7Og9lWM6fCShRweiYhz4A3ZkMGgVmMLIJSQo/edit?usp=sharing

title: Addicted at 13: How Crystal Meth Is Killing Europe
